Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
trigger::ANDImplementation for the AND operator
trigger::ConditionParent class for each condition A condition can be a node : it store 1 or 2 other conditions, or a final node : it just implements some eval of the condition
generate_config::ConfigManagerGeneral config manager which can ask user about config settings, check results and write config file
generate_config::datetimeConfigAsk the user for specific config for the xPL datetime module
domogik::doxypy::FSMImplements a finite state machine
generate_config::generalConfigAsk the user for general configuration and write results
generate_config::genericPluginConfigGeneric list for plugins
xPLAPI::ListenerListener are objects which are able to check if a message match some filter and to call a function if they do
trigger::ListenerBuilderClass to parse an expression and create appropriated listener
configloader::LoaderParse Domogik config files
xPLAPI::ManagerManager is the main component of the system You can run many managers on different port Each manager will send an heartbeat message on broadcast on port 3865 to announce itself to the xPL Hub
xPLAPI::MessageMessage is the object for all data received form the network
trigger::NOTImplementation for the NOT operator
onewire::OneWireManage OneWire
onewire::OneWireExceptionOneWire exception
trigger::ORImplementation for the OR operator
domogik::control::SampleDataHelper::SampleDataHelperClass to load / clear sample data
generate_config::senderConfigAsk the user for specific config for the xPL sender
trigger::stateCondImplementation of the state condition This allows user to describe a condition on any item of the system
trigger::timeCondImplementation of the time condition This allows user to describe time periods like cron
generate_config::triggerConfigAsk the user for specific config for the xPL sender
x10API::X10APIThis class define some facilities to use X10
generate_config::x10ConfigAsk the user for specific config for X10 xPL module
x10API::X10ExceptionX10 exception
datetime::xPLDateTimeSend date and time on the xPL network every minute
xPLAPI::XPLExceptionXPL exception
xPLAPI::xPLTimerXPLTimer will call a callback function each n seconds
